Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-LT2 (XXA; Leu-rich; UCLL1c; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; BBMm; Temporin-CDYb, MIC >100, inactive)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against Gram+ S. aureus (MIC 12.5 ug/ml) and B. subtilis (MIC 50 ug/ml). No activity detected against Gram- bacteria P.fluorescens and fungi C.albicans.Toxicity: Hemolysis LD50 >200 ug/ml. Updated 5/2020; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Wang H, Yan X, Yu H, Hu Y, Yu Z, Zheng H, Chen Z, Zhang Z, Liu J.2009
Literature Information.Title: Isolation, characterization and molecular cloning of new antimicrobial peptides belonging to the brevinin-1 and temporin families from the skin of Hylarana latouchii (Anura: Ranidae).
